TERM: AI/ML Integration

DEFINITION:
AI/ML Integration: Machine Learning Algorithms:

Deep Learning Algorithms:

Natural Language Processing:

By integrating AI and ML algorithms into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to learn from data, make predictions, and provide insights and recommendations to users.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices and sensors to enable the system to collect and analyze data from a wide range of sources.
